unit.name: King
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Plate Armour, Shield Wall, Sturdy

unit.name: Thane
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Plate Armour, Shield Wall, Sturdy

unit.name: Dragon Seeker
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Not a Leader, Unbreakable, Fearless, Vanguard, Magic Resistance (1), The bigger they are, Aegis (6+), Great Weapon, Sturdy, Weapon Master, Lethal Strike, Paired Weapons, Yer comin with me

unit.name: Runic Smith
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Channel (1), Magic Resistance (1), Rune Craft Mastery, Plate Armour, Shield Wall, Sturdy

unit.name: Engineer
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Engineer (3+), Entrench, Plate Armour, Shield Wall, Sturdy

unit.name: Anvil of Power
unit.description: single model, 0-1 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base: 60 mm round, Channel (2), Unbreakable, Fearless, War Machine, Magic Resistance (2), Not a Leader, Runic Anvil, Plate Armour, Aegis (5+)

unit.name: Clan Warriors
unit.description: Height: Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Scoring, Heavy Armour, Shield Wall, Sturdy

unit.name: Greybeards
unit.description: Height: Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Fearless, Scoring, Seen It All, Heavy Armour, Shield Wall, Sturdy

unit.name: Clan Marksmen
unit.description: 0-4 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Scoring, Heavy Armour, Shield Wall, Sturdy

unit.name: Deep Watch
unit.description: Height: Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Bodyguard, Scoring, Plate Armour, Shield, Wall of Iron, Sturdy

unit.name: Kings Guard
unit.description: 0-5 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Bodyguard (General, King), Scoring, Plate Armour, Shield, Great Weapon, Sturdy

unit.name: Miners
unit.description: 0-2 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Ambush, Scoring, Heavy Armour, Shield Wall, Sturdy

unit.name: Rangers
unit.description: 0-2 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Scoring, Scout, Strider (Forest), Heavy Armour, Shield Wall, Sturdy

unit.name: Seekers
unit.description: 0-3 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Unbreakable, Fearless, The bigger they are, Aegis (6+), Great Weapon, Paired Weapons, Sturdy, Weapon Master, Yer comin with me

unit.name: Vengeance Seeker
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Unbreakable, Fearless, The bigger they are, Aegis (6+), Distracting, Hard Target (1), Yer comin with me, Whirling Chains of Doom

unit.name: Hold Guardians
unit.description: 0-2 Units per Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base: 40x40 mm, Scoring, Fearless, Runic Engravings, Plate Armour, Magical Attacks

unit.name: Grudge Buster
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units per Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base: 50x100 mm, Fly (8", 8"), Swiftstride, Chassis: Harnessed, Impact Hits (D6+1), Grind Attacks (3D3), Forge Repeater (4+)

unit.name: Forge Wardens
unit.description: 0-30 Models per Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Scoring, Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks), Plate Armour, Sturdy, Forge Gun

unit.name: Attack Copter
unit.description: 0-2 Units of Attack Copters per Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base: 40x40 mm, Fly (8", 16"), Tall, Light Troops, Swiftstride, Cannot be Stomped, Forge Repeater (4+), Shrapnel Grenades

unit.name: Steam Bomber
unit.description: 0-2 Steam Bombers per Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base: 40x40 mm, Fly (8", 16"), Tall, Light Troops, Swiftstride, Cannot be Stomped, Forge Repeater (4+), Shrapnel Bombs

unit.name: Dwarf Ballista
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base: 60 mm round, Stubborn, War Machine, Engineering Rune, Heavy Armour, Move or Fire, Dwarf Ballista (4+)

unit.name: Flame Cannon
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base: 60 mm round, Stubborn, War Machine, Engineering Rune, Heavy Armour, Move or Fire, Flamethrower

unit.name: Catapult
unit.description: single model, Height Large, Type Construct, Base: 60 mm round, Stubborn, War Machine, Engineering Rune, Heavy Armour, Move or Fire, Catapult (4+), Catapult (4x4)

unit.name: Cannon
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base: 60 mm round, Stubborn, War Machine, Engineering Rune, Heavy Armour, Move or Fire, Cannon (4+), Cannon&Volley Gun

unit.name: Organ Gun
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base: 60 mm round, Stubborn, War Machine, Engineering Rune, Heavy Armour, Move or Fire, Organ Gun (4+)

mount.name: Shield Bearers
mount.description: Standard, Infantry, 40x20 mm, Tall, Harnessed, Sturdy

mount.name: War Throne
mount.description: Standard, Infantry, 40x60 mm, Tall, Majesty of High Kings, Harnessed, Sturdy, Hatred

item.name: Hewn out of Mountains
item.description: The Casting Values of all spells cast by enemy models are increased by +1 as long as at least one friendly model from a Dwarven Holds army is on the Battlefield.

item.name: Ancient Grudge
item.description: Dwarven Holds armies have a number of Ancient Grudges which confer a bonus when attacking specific enemies. The total number of Grudges held by a Dwarven Holds army is calculated in the following manner: - One Grudge for a General with Ancestral Memory. - One Grudge for each King in the army. - Two Grudges for each War Throne in the army. - Right before the battle (during step 7 of the Deployment Phase Sequence), you must choose a single unit from the opponents Army List for each Grudge in your army (this may also be a Character). The models of this unit are considered marked. All models in the Dwarven Holds army gain Hatred against marked models, and against models joined to units with more than half of their models marked.

item.name: Holdstone
item.description: One use only. May be activated at the start of any Round of Combat. The effects last until the unit is no longer Engaged in Combat. Apply the following effects: - Enemy units cannot claim Combat Score bonuses for fighting the Flank or the Rear of the unit. - The unit cannot be Disrupted. - Shield Wall, Wall of Iron, and Parry can be used in any Facing. - For the purpose of Supporting Attacks, all Facings are considered to be the Front Facing (i.e. a model can perform Supporting Attacks also to the Flanks and Rear). - The unit cannot Pursue (nor Overrun).

item.name: Rune of Resonance
item.description: Bound Spell, Power Level (5/8). Range 12", Type Augment, Duration Permanent. Once per Magic Phase, a single unit with at least one model affected by the Rune of Resonance may be chosen as an additional target of a Battle Rune that a friendly model is casting anywhere on the Battlefield (during step 1 of the Casting Attempt), with the following restrictions: - A unit cannot be chosen if it is already a target of the Battle Rune. - All instances of the Rune of Resonance on a unit immediately end when a Battle Rune is successfully cast on the unit. - Characters that leave a Combined Unit are no longer affected by the Rune of Resonance.

item.name: Ancestral Memory
item.description: A General with Ancestral Memory affects the number of Grudges held by a Dwarven Holds army (see Ancient Grudge).

item.name: The bigger they are
The bigger they are…
item.description: When Charging a unit that contains at least one Large or Gigantic model, the model gains Swiftstride for the Charge Range roll.

item.name: Shield Wall
item.description: When using a Shield, the model gains Aegis (6+, against Close Combat Attacks). This is improved to Aegis (5+, against Close Combat Attacks) if the attacker is Charging. This Special Save can only be used against attacks from enemies Engaged in the models units Front Facing.

item.name: Sturdy
item.description: Close Combat. The model gains Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP) and does not suffer from negative to-hit modifiers from a Stand and Shoot Charge Reaction.

item.name: Yer comin with me
item.description: Close Combat. In order to use this Attack Attribute, the unit must be at least as wide as it is deep at the start of the Round of Combat. Close Combat Attacks made by models with this Attack Attribute can never wound on worse than 4+. In addition, when a model with this Attack Attribute is removed as a casualty during the Melee Phase due to a Melee Attack, it must immediately, before removal, perform a single Close Combat Attack with the following rules and restrictions: - The attack is always resolved with Strength 5 and Armour Penetration 2. - The owner must choose one of the following options: (1) The attack is allocated towards the model that caused the casualty. (2) The attack is allocated towards a R&F model in that models unit. The hit is distributed onto the unit. In either case, the model with Yer comin with me! is considered in base contact with the attacked model, and the models count as Engaged in the same Facing as their units. - This Attack Attribute cannot be used against casualties caused by Impact Hits.

item.name: Guild-Crafted Handgun
Guild-Crafted Handgun (3+)
Guild-Crafted Handgun (4+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 24", Shots 1, Str 4, AP 2, Unwieldy, Accurate.

item.name: Wyrm-Slayer Rocket
Wyrm-Slayer Rocket (3+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 24", Shots 1, Str 6, AP 3, Multiple Wounds (D3), Flaming Attacks, Reload!

item.name: Forge Repeater
Forge Repeater (4+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 18", Shots 4, Str 5, AP 2, Flaming Attacks, Quick to Fire.

item.name: Rune of Revocation
item.description: Type: Universal Duration: One Turn All other spells with duration One Turn for which the target of the Rune of Revocation was the spells target immediately come to an end (note that if any of these spells had more than one target, their effects also end for these targets). In addition, the next successfully cast enemy spell which targets the unit, including Aura spells and Attribute Spells, is automatically dispelled (this is an exception to the Spell Casting Sequence and to the rule that Attribute Spells cannot be dispelled).

item.name: Rune of Reckoning
item.description: Type: Augment Duration: One Turn The target must reroll failed to-hit rolls with its Close Combat Attacks.

item.name: Rune of Oaths
item.description: Type: Augment Duration: One Turn The target must reroll failed to-wound rolls with its Melee Attacks.

item.name: Rune of Resolve
item.description: Duration: Instant The target may perform a 6" Magical Move.

item.name: Rune of Gleaming
item.description: Rune of Gleaming Type: Augment Duration: One Turn The target gains Distracting and Hard Target (1).

item.name: Rune of Resilience
item.description: Type: Augment Duration: One Turn All to-wound rolls against the target suffer a -1 modifier.

item.name: Rune of Destruction
item.description: 0-1 per Army. Attacks made with a weapon engraved with this Rune gain Multiple Wounds (D3).

item.name: Rune of Smashing
item.description: Models on foot only. 0-1 per Army. Attacks made with a weapon engraved with this Rune that are allocated towards a model with Resilience 5 or more have their Strength set to 10 and their Armour Penetration set to 10.

item.name: Rune of Penetration
item.description: Attacks made with a weapon engraved with one or more Runes of Penetrating gain +3 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Rune of Quickening
item.description: For each Rune of Quickening engraved on a weapon, the wielder gains +3 Agility when using it.

item.name: Rune of Might
item.description: For each Rune of Might engraved on a weapon, attacks made with it gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Rune of Precision
item.description: The wielder of a weapon engraved with this Rune gains Lightning Reflexes.

item.name: Rune of Craftsmanship
item.description: 0-3 per Army. A weapon engraved with this Rune follows the rules for Great Weapons instead of the original weapons rules (this does not prevent the weapon from being engraved with additional Runes).

item.name: Rune of Fury
item.description: For each Rune of Fury engraved on a weapon, the wielder gains +1 Attack Value when using it.

item.name: Rune of Lightning
item.description: 0-3 per Army. If the wielder scores at least one successful hit with a weapon engraved with one or more Runes of Lightning (consider each set of simultaneous attacks separately), each enemy unit that was hit suffers an additional D3 hits for each instance of this Rune. The hits are considered Special Attacks and are resolved with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 1, and Magical Attacks.

item.name: Rune of Returning
item.description: A weapon engraved with this Rune can be used as a Shooting Weapon with Aim 2+ and the following profile: Range 8", Shots 1, Str as user, AP as user, Quick to Fire, Accurate, Reload!. Shooting Attacks with this weapon are affected by all Runic Weapon Enchantments on the engraved weapon (even if the effects are normally restricted to Close Combat Attacks).

item.name: Rune of Fire
item.description: At the start of any phase or Round of Combat, this Rune may be activated. If so, attacks made with a weapon engraved with this Rune become Flaming Attacks until the end of the phase.

item.name: Rune of Resistance
item.description: 0-1 per Army. Successful to-wound rolls against the model of the wearer of an armour engraved with this Rune must be rerolled.

item.name: Rune of Steel
item.description: The wearer of an armour engraved with this Rune must reroll failed Armour Saves.

item.name: Rune of Iron
item.description: The wearer of an armour engraved with - A single Rune of Iron gains +1 Armour. - Two or more Runes of Iron gains +2 Armour.

item.name: Rune of Retribution
item.description: Whenever the wearer of an armour engraved with one or more Runes of Retribution rolls a successful Shield Wall Aegis roll (including Shield Wall stacked with Rune of Shielding), the attacking model suffers a hit with the Strength and Armour Penetration of the saved attack. This is considered a Special Attack.

item.name: Rune of the Forge
item.description: The wearer of an armour engraved with this Rune gains Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks).

item.name: Rune of Denial
item.description: Dominant. 0-1 per Army. One use only. The player may choose to use this Rune instead of performing a Dispelling Attempt. The spell is automatically dispelled.

item.name: Rune of Devouring
item.description: Runic Smiths only. Dominant. 0-1 per Army. One use only. The player may choose to use this Rune instead of performing a Dispelling Attempt. The spell is cast as normal but the Caster may not cast it again for the rest of the game. Spells dispelled by the Rune of Revocation and Attribute Spells are not affected.

item.name: Rune of Dragons Breath
item.description: 0-3 per Army. The bearer gains Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks). A single friendly Rune of Dragons Breath may be used per Round of Combat.

item.name: Rune of Harnessing
item.description: Runic Smiths only. Enemy models within 24" of the Runic Smith have their Channel value (the value within brackets) reduced by 1, to a minimum of 0.

item.name: Rune of Courage
item.description: One use only. May be activated at the start of any Round of Combat. For the duration of the phase, the bearer gains Stubborn.

item.name: Rune of Grounding
item.description: Runic Smiths only. 0-1 per Army. One use only. May be activated at the start of any Melee Phase. All spells with duration One Turn that affect any of the following units come to an end: - The bearers unit - Enemy units in base contact with the bearer

item.name: Rune of Readiness
item.description: One use only. May be activated at the end of the Charge Phase, directly after all Charge Moves have been resolved. If the bearers unit was successfully Charged during this phase, it may perform a Combat Reform (following the normal rules for Combat Reforms).

item.name: Rune of Storms
item.description: 0-2 per Army. One use only. Effects last one Player Turn. May be activated at the start of the opponents Player Turn. Choose a single enemy unit within 24" of the bearer. The Advance Rate and March Rate of all models with Fly in that unit (both for Ground and Fly Movement) are halved, rounding fractions up.

item.name: Rune of Shielding
item.description: The bearer gains Aegis (+1, max. 4+). The Aegis from this Rune only stacks with itself and/or Shield Wall.

item.name: Rune of Mastery
item.description: One use only. May be activated just before the bearer casts a Bound Spell. Add (+2/+2) to the Power Level of this Bound Spell for this Casting Attempt.

item.name: Rune of Mining
item.description: After Determining Deployment Zones (at the end of step 6 of the The Pre-Game Sequence), choose a Terrain Feature on the Battlefield. As long the bearer is on the Battlefield, all friendly models may treat this as Open Terrain when making Advance Moves or March Moves, but must still follow the Unit Spacing rule at the end of their movement.

item.name: Rune of Kinship
item.description: Cannot be taken by models on War Throne The bearer gains Scout and Ambush.

item.name: Runic Standard of Shielding
item.description: Battle Standard Bearer, Deep Watch, and Kings Guard only. 0-1 per Army. All friendly units within 6" of the bearer gain Aegis (5+, against Shooting Attacks).

item.name: Runic Standard of Swiftness
item.description: 0-1 per Army. The bearers unit gains Vanguard.

item.name: Runic Standard of Dismay
item.description: 0-1 per Army. Units Charging the bearers unit suffer -2" Advance Rate for their Charge Range roll.

item.name: Runic Standard of Steadiness
item.description: 0-3 per Army One use only. May be activated at the start of any Movement Phase. The bearers unit gains Quick to Fire until the end of the Player Turn.

item.name: Runic Standard of the Anvil
item.description: 0-3 per Army. Friendly units Charging enemy units Engaged in Combat with the bearers unit must reroll failed Charge Range rolls.

item.name: Runic Standard of Wisdom
item.description: 0-1 per Army. The bearer may select a single Battle Rune during Spell Selection. This Battle Rune can be cast by the bearer and has range Casters Unit.

item.name: Runic Standard of the Hold
item.description: 0-3 per Army. A unit with one or more Runic Standards of the Hold counts as having an additional Full Rank for the purpose of Steadfast and Disrupted.

item.name: Majesty of High Kings
item.description: Universal Rule. The range of Commanding Presence of a General mounted on a War Throne is set to 18".

item.name: Monster Seeker
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. The model gains Multiple Wounds (2, against Large, Gigantic).

item.name: Grim Resolve
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. The model gains +1 Attack Value for each enemy model in base contact with it (including the model it is fighting a Duel with if applicable).

item.name: Rune Craft Mastery
item.description: Universal Rule. Close Combat Attacks from models in the same unit as one or more models with Rune Craft Mastery gain +1 Armour Penetration. Each Runic Smith may select up to three different Battle Runes during Spell Selection, provided it paid for them.

item.name: Entrench
item.description: Universal Rule. Right before the battle (during step 7 of the Deployment Phase Sequence), the model may Entrench a single War Machine. The War Machine counts as being in Hard Cover. The War Machine loses this rule permanently if it performs an Advance or March Move or a Random Movement.

item.name: Runic Anvil
item.description: Universal Rule. Each Anvil of Power may select up to three different Battle Runes during Spell Selection.

item.name: Spear & Shield
item.description: - Spear: Attacks made with a Spear gain Fight in Extra Rank and +1 Armour Penetration. Attacks made with a Spear gain +2 Agility and an additional +1 Armour Penetration in the First Round of Combat provided the attacking models unit is not Charging and is not Engaged either in its Flank or Rear Facing. Only Infantry can use Spears. - Shield: +1 Armour

item.name: Seen It All
item.description: Universal Rule. Friendly units within 6" of a non-Fleeing Greybeard unit may reroll failed Panic Tests.

item.name: Crossbow (4+) and Great Weapon
item.description: - Crossbow: Range 30", Shots 1, Strength 4, AP 1, Unwieldy - Great Weapon: Two-Handed . Attacks made with a Great Weapon gain +2 Strength, +2 Armour Penetration, and strike at Initiative Step 0 (regardless of the wielders Agility).

item.name: Wall of Iron
item.description: Personal Protection. The model gains Aegis (5+, against Close Combat Attacks). This rule can only be used against attacks from enemies Engaged in the models units Front Facing.

item.name: Crag Warden
item.description: Universal Rule. 0-15 Models per Unit. The model loses Scoring and gains Skirmisher, Light Troops, and Hard Target (1).

item.name: Brothers of Vengeance
item.description: Universal Rule. 0-1 Units per Army and 0-15 Models per Unit. The model gains Skirmisher, Light Troops, and Hard Target (1).

item.name: Whirling Chains of Doom
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength, +1 Armour Penetration, and always strike at Initiative Step 10 (regardless of the wielders Agility). A model with this weapon cannot be joined by Characters.

item.name: Runic Engravings
item.description: Universal Rule. At step 8 of the Pre- Game Sequence (after Spell Selection), each Hold Guardian unit must choose one of the following effects, which is applied for the duration of the game: - +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration - Vanguard - +2 Agility

item.name: Forge Gun
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 18", Shots 1, Str 3, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, always hits on 2+.

item.name: Shrapnel Grenades
item.description: Special Attack. Sweeping Attack which can be used once per game. The enemy unit suffers D3 hits for each Steam Copter in the unit. Hits are resolved with Strength 3 and Armour Penetration 0.

item.name: Shrapnel Bombs
item.description: Special Attack. Sweeping Attack. The enemy unit suffers D6*2 hits with Strength 3 and Armour Penetration 1. If a natural 6 is rolled for the number of hits, after the attack has been resolved, the Shrapnel Bombs cannot be used anymore during this battle.

item.name: Engineering Rune
item.description: Universal Rule. Field Artillery adds +4 to any roll on the Misfire Table.

item.name: Flaming Shot
item.description: Attack Attribute - Shooting. Hits caused by the Field Artillerys Shooting Attacks gain Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

item.name: Dwarf Ballista
item.description: Artillery Weapon: Range 48", Shots 1, Str 3[6], AP 10, [Multiple Wounds (D3)], Area Attack (1x5).

item.name: Dwarf Ballista: Rune Crafted
item.description: Shots from a Dwarf Ballista gain Magical Attacks and Accurate. The model gains Scout with the following exception: It must be deployed fully inside the owners Deployment Zone.

item.name: Flame Cannon: Rune Crafted
item.description: The models Height is changed to Large.

item.name: Flamethrower
item.description: Artillery Weapon: Range 24", Shots 1, Str 4{5}, AP 1{2}, {Multiple Wounds (D3)}, Flaming Attacks.

item.name: Catapult
item.description: Artillery Weapon: Range 12-60", Shots 1, Str 3[7], AP 0[4], [Multiple Wounds (D3, Clipped Wings)].

item.name: Catapult: Rune Crafted
item.description: Hits caused by the Catapult gain +1 Strength, +2 Armour Penetration, and Magical Attacks.

item.name: Cannon&Volley Gun
item.description: Can be fired in two ways: - As a Cannon Artillery Weapon: Range 60", Shots 1, Str 4[10], AP 0[10], Area Attack (1x5), [Multiple Wounds (D3+1, Clipped Wings)]. - As a Volley Gun Artillery Weapon: Range 12", Shots 2D6, Str 4, AP 4.

item.name: Cannon: Rune Crafted
item.description: Hits caused by the Cannon gain +1 Strength, +1 Armour Penetration, and Magical Attacks.

item.name: Organ Gun: Rune Crafted
item.description: Hits caused by the Organ Gun gain a +1 to-wound modifier and Magical Attacks.

item.name: Organ Gun
item.description: Volley Gun Artillery Weapon: Range 30", Shots 2D6*2, Str 5, AP 3.
